${ModID}:ClintsReptilesEvent.NAME: Clint's Reptile Room
DESCRIPTIONS: You duck into a strange room. NL Decorated with plants, books and pictures of animals.
A strange man enters the room. He's wearing a colourful shirt and tie with a small green lizard pendant pinned to his lapel.
He speaks with a strangely #p~calming~ voice.
"Well hi there! What kind of animal do you wish to #ylearn about?"
"As always, like and subscribe. And we hope to see you soon!"
Hmmm.....Seems you already have that one....Take this instead.

${ModID}:BoBathroomEvent.NAME: Bo's Bathroom
DESCRIPTIONS: A friend offers you the use of their #ybathroom in your climb up the spire.
When asked if it's #bclean, he claims "It's fine. It got #bcleaned last week.", he hesitates before adding "Also the pipe size is #rperfectly #rnormal.".
NL Upon entering you find to your horror the room so #p@FILTHY@ and #p@ENCRUSTED@ you can't make out anything's original colour.
NL What do you do?
"Oh Wow! So that's what it's meant to look like!"
"But it's fine! I'm only ever in it for #b3 or #b4 minutes!"
"Fine! Fine! I'll do it! NL This will be the #b~cleanest~ bathroom you've ever seen!"
"Oh wow! NL Thanks! NL I didn't know grout was meant to be white."

${ModID}:GeoGuesserEvent.NAME: Geo Guesser
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across a fun looking game that tests your knowledge of the world. NL NL You approach out of curiosity.
To win a prize, you must correctly guess the pictured location on the world map. NL NL But be careful...there is a curse upon those who choose poorly!
Success! NL Take this badge as proof of your cartographic prediction skills.
Hmmmm... NL Close enough. NL Have this card as a consolation prize.
Oh No! You were
cards off! NL You're clearly cursed for perpetual directional bewilderment.
Hmmmm...close enough. You may choose a card as a consolation prize.
